level_1.challenge: There's nothing here, hmmmm, how do I make this repo?

level_2.challenge: Your boss wants you to clone the company repo, not your own. Clone it from git@yourCompany.com/gitBetter, and do it every time!

level_3.challenge: Now you made some changes, you can go ahead and add them all to the staging area at once!

level_4.challenge: Your boss just sent you an angry email because you added all of your changes to the staging area at once. Add each file individually!

level_5.challenge: Now you have to commit the changes. Add each file individually and make a commit with git commit -m 'your message' for each file! And check that they look good with git log!

level_6.challenge: Boss: Why haven't you pushed any of your code to the repo???????????

level_7.challenge: Your boss wants three separate branches. Make them!!!!!!

level_8.challenge: This is it! Make the branches, commit the files, and push it all!
